item.title: Report X-2024120425
item.description:
Report X-2024120425

Identified by scraper @ 2024-12-09T12:25:35+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-11-19
  • City: GREER
  • State: SC
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Shipment was discovered during sort operations. Held for security for inspection. Inner contents: 4 Sauvage parfum x 100 ml, 2 Prada Paradoxe x 90 ml, 2 Versace Bright Crystal x 90 ml, 2 Tom Ford Oud Wood x 100 ml, 2 Gucci Flora x 100 ml, 2 Tom Ford Tobacco x 100 ml, 2 Tom Ford F$@*kin Fabulous x 100 ml Miniatures- 1 Channel Bleu x 0.25 oz, 1 Chanel Chance Pink x 0.25 oz, 1 Tom Ford Lost Cherry x 7.4 ml, 1 Tom Ford Rose Prick 7.4 ml, 1 Tom Ford Fabulous 7.4 ml, 1 YSL Mon Paris 7.5 ml Outer packaging: box covered in tan masking tape. No Release. The commercial invoice states "16 pieces Rose Essential oils, material, Propanediol, melon aldehyde used for skin care." MSDS attached to the shipment (Rose Oil Essentials, Section 14: Not applicable. The shipment is being held for FAA investigation.
